Source code for pyutil.math.gcd_recur

#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""Give a one sentence summary in the imperative

import sys



[docs]def gcdRecur(a, b):
    if b == 0:
        return a
    if b > a:
        tmp = b
        b = a
        a = tmp
    return gcdRecur(b, a % b)



if __name__ == "__main__":
    a, b = sys.argv[1:3]
    gcdRecur(a, b)
